basics.summary: As an experienced full stack engineer with expertise in back-end and front-end development, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and serverless technologies, I have worked across multiple domains driven by my curiosity and passion for learning.

work.name: Flock
work.summary: I build end-to-end features that help partners make better decisions, advancing our goal of making the world quantifiably safer. Collaborating with Trading and Growth teams, I take a product-driven approach across the full stack: infrastructure, databases, backend, frontend, security, and design.
highlights: Specialized in serverless event-driven architecture on AWS
Full-stack development using TypeScript, React, and PostgreSQL
Work in both monorepo and microservices implementations
Strong CI/CD pipeline implementation with TDD approach
